$300 / 4br - 2000ft² - THANKSGIVING IN TAHOE -- Wonderful house/location, hot tub, sleeps 10+ (Tahoe-Truckee)

Date: 2012-10-29, 11:19AM PDT
Reply to: qpgfn-3372916109@hous.craigslist.org [Errors when replying to ads?]

Great House for Thanksgiving
Wed Nov 21 check in (a couple days earlier ok)
Sun Nov 25 check out
$300 per night for 4 night minimum = $1,200

House highlights:
-- House located in great location (only 2 3/4 hour drive from San Fran so cuts off the extra commute if you were instead going to west shore which can be 3 1/2 hours)
-- 4 bedroom, sleeps 10+
-- Comes furnished with great modern furnishings -- please note this is not your typical cabin (see photos) there are no cabin hangings with bear and moose ornamentation -- instead it is bright and modern

House details:
2 levels to this dwelling (first floor has great room and master, second floor has guest rooms and loft) - please note there are uncovered stairs to climb from the driveway up to front door
4 bedrooms plus pull out sleep 10+ very comfortably:
--1 master on first floor (King, sleeps 2)
--1 small guest on second floor (Queen, sleeps 2)
--1 loft is an unclosed bedroom on second floor (Double, sleeps 2)
--1 small kids bunk on second floor (Double and Twin, sleeps 3) - plus room for 2-3 extra sleeping bags if needed
--1 pull out couch in great room first floor (Double sleeps 2)
(All rooms are in the photos)
Greatroom with kitchen, dining, living all together:
--modern kitchen with built in 3 foot cutting boards, extra bar sink, nice size pantry, stainless steel appliances, great counter space
--long counter top with bar stools seating for 3
--huge dining area with table with 2 extra leaves to enlarge table (from seating 6 to seating ~14)
--great living area
--beautiful fire place and entertainment set up - wifi/tv
Each level has full bathroom (master on first floor, guest on second floor - guest bath has divider so showering/toilet can be separated from sink area -- useful when house is full)
2 closed garage parking, big flat drive with room for 4+ more cars to park outside
Lots of beautiful land - backs up to national forest, views of trees from all windows
Great laundry and utility room for ski storage
Front mud room with plenty of ski storage
Back deck has enclosed Hot tub with sliding glass door (huge 8 person hot tub!!)
Centrally located (Squaw 15 minutes, Sugar Bowl 15 minutes, Alpine 17 minutes, NorthStar 20 minutes)
Great views of the mountains (you can see backside of Northstar runs from the front deck)

A great house with modern and comfortable feel inside
Email to show interest and to request a vacation rental contract
Dogs/cats ok within reason

HAVE A HAPPY THANKSGIVING IN TAHOE!!

-------------
Fine print:
-- Utilities included but please bring or buy your own firewood (fire place is awesome! and quick at warming the entire place in a jiffy)
-- Driveway winter plow included during stay (but you will need to have steps done by a service or do it yourself while in town if a snow fall hits mid-way during your stay)
-- Dogs ok within reason (extra $25/night deposit)
-- This 4 bedroom house is 2 levels with uncovered stairs to climb up to the entryway, keep this in mind for your elder relatives
-- The 4 bedroom house is what you are renting for the holiday, there is a separate 1 bedroom on the property that has a full time tenant
-- $50/night deposit and $200 cleaning deposit to get the keys and get this great place for turkey day!!










Northwoods Blvd at Bull Pine Trail (google map) (yahoo map)
